title: Rag-template config schema
description: Schema for configuring AI Rag Template, an intelligent virtual assistant.

apiVersion.description: The API version of the Azure OpenAI service to be used.

deploymentName.description: The name of the configured deployment model to be used by AI RAG Template.

name.description: The name of the language model (LLM) to be used. Check the Azure OpenAI documentation for available models.

type.description: The type of language model to be used by AI RAG Template for natural language processing and understanding.

url.description: The URL of the Azure OpenAI service to connect with.

temperature.description: The temperature parameter for sampling from the language model. A higher value increases the randomness of the generated text.

type.description: The type of language model to be used by AI RAG Template for natural language processing and understanding.

name.description: The name of the language model (LLM) to be used. Check the OpenAI documentation for available models.

temperature.description: The temperature parameter for sampling from the language model. A higher value increases the randomness of the generated text.

apiVersion.description: The API version of the Azure OpenAI service to be used.

deploymentName.description: The name of the configured deployment model to be used by AI RAG Template.

name.description: The name of the embeddings model to be used by RAG-template for various tasks such as text representation and similarity.

type.description: The type of language model to be used by AI RAG Template for the embeddings generation.

url.description: The URL of the Azure OpenAI service to connect with.

type.description: The type of language model to be used by AI RAG Template for the embeddings generation.

name.description: The name of the embeddings model to be used by RAG-template for various tasks such as text representation and similarity.

dbName.description: The name of the database where the vector store is hosted.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection of vectors to be used by RAG-template for various tasks such as text representation and similarity.

indexName.description: The name of the index to be used by RAG-template for various tasks such as text representation and similarity.

relevanceScoreFn.description: The function used to calculate relevance scores for vectors. Options: 'euclidean', 'cosine', 'dotProduct'.

embeddingKey.description: The key used to identify embeddings in the vector store.

textKey.description: The key used to store text data in the vector store.

maxDocumentsToRetrieve.description: The maximum number of documents to be retrieved from the vector store.

maxScoreDistance.description: The maximum score distance for the vectors.

minScoreDistance.description: The maximum score distance for the vectors.

aggregateMaxTokenNumber.description: The maximum number of tokens to be used for aggregation of multiple responses from different services.

system.description: The system prompt to be used for the RAG chain.

user.description: The user prompt to be used for the RAG chain.
